meta.title: Venezuela Digital Observatory
meta.description: Real-time monitoring of Venezuelan government websites (.gob.ve and .mil.ve). Track availability, SSL certificates, and server status.
meta.keywords: Venezuela, government, monitoring, transparency, open data, digital observatory

home.title: Venezuela Digital Observatory - Government Website Monitoring
home.description: Real-time monitoring of 2,500+ Venezuelan government websites. Track availability, SSL certificates, response times, and server status for .gob.ve and .mil.ve domains.

domains.title: All Domains - Venezuela Digital Observatory
domains.description: Browse and search all monitored Venezuelan government domains. Filter by status, SSL certificate validity, and HTTP response codes.

trends.title: Trends & Analytics - Venezuela Digital Observatory
trends.description: Historical availability data, response time trends, and SSL certificate expiration tracking for Venezuelan government websites.

domain.title: {domain} - Venezuela Digital Observatory
domain.description: Monitoring details for {domain}: availability status, SSL certificate info, response times, server headers, and check history.

overview.title: Venezuela Digital Observatory
overview.subtitle: Real-time monitoring of Venezuelan government websites
overview.loadError: Unable to load data. Please try again later.

home.whySubtitle: Digital transparency for an informed citizenry
home.mission: In times where access to public information is increasingly difficult, we believe that monitoring the government's digital infrastructure is an act of civic transparency. Government websites are the gateway to public services, procedures, and official data. When these sites fail or become inaccessible, citizens lose access to fundamental rights.

monitoring.title: Continuous monitoring
monitoring.description: We check each domain periodically, recording availability, response times, and SSL certificate status.

openData.title: Open data
openData.description: All collected information is public domain (CC0). You can download, analyze, and reuse the data freely.

forEveryone.title: For everyone
forEveryone.description: Journalists, researchers, civil society organizations, and citizens can use this data for analysis and reporting.

independent.title: Independent
independent.description: This project is not affiliated with any political party or government entity. It is an independent civic initiative.

footer.disclaimer: This project is independent and not affiliated with any government entity.
